deck.name: Wingbird
deck.description: A swift and agile character known for their quick thinking and faster actions.
deck.ability: Quick Strike: Wingbird can make the first move in a duel.

deck.name: Mountain Top
deck.description: A lofty location with breathtaking views and strategic high ground.
deck.ability: High Ground: All characters on Mountain Top gain +2 Defense.

deck.name: egg
deck.ability: Eggcellent: All characters with an egg gain +1 Attack. Burn to hatch a Wingbird.

deckdescription: A deck of cards suggested by PT4 to begin the with practical and simple tests.
creator: Tippi & PT4
